HOBBIES

Hi there, I'm Kamil Oseni! I'm a sucker for all things art - paintings, sculptures, talent, dance, the environment, anything that screams art. When I'm not binging on cartoons or anime, you can find me rollerblading, writing, or taking pictures of my surrounding. And of course, I have a huge soft spot for dogs too!

CRACK Control Hub

The CRACK Control Hub is a smart application through which all CRACK devices can be managed and controlled effectively.

Click to view prototype

Marketing Dashboard

I assisted in the design of a Marketing dashboard design for the Michael Fajemilehin BI consultancy. The dashboard tracks revenue and other important marketing metrics from different stores, based on their utilization of specified marketing channels, to assist in making data-driven decisions.

Click to view published dashboard Click to view prototype

CRACK Website Design

I designed the CRACK website, an interactive web platform that reflects the company's brand identity and provides an intuitive user experience through the use of visual elements, colors and ergonomic design to enhance the user's overall perception of the website.

Click to view prototype

Glass Website Design

Glass is an interactive fashion website that's designed to feel sleek and modern. One of the cool features is the AR changing room that lets you try on different outfits in augmented reality. I think this will be a hit with most people and also help companies boost sales.

Click to view prototype
